publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8198 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Double Jeopardy (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Double Jeopardy (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 and 2: 25 minutes. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*

S3M-8198 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Double Jeopardy (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Double Jeopardy (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 and 2: 25 minutes. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill
